text: karobriebthieb nouv avei del puokke( anak del kmean chomnue) ban brichcheak nowknong chivit lokey nih hakdauchchea khyal del mean pheap trachak khlang bk mk bah nung damnam robsa krom muoy del ban bampean leu khluoneng haey khyal noh kaban bamphlanh vea . a l laoh minban bampean leu puokke laey te puokke te del bampean leu khluoneng noh
